overview:
The promise of being in the hub of the city has always been alluring for our travelers. Homcourt serviced apartment Chennai is located in Nungambakkam, which is one of Chennaiâ€™s prime residential areas and often termed as a â€˜city in itselfâ€™. The neighborhood is abound with multi-national commercial establishments, important government offices, foreign consulates, educational institutions, shopping malls, sporting facilities, tourist spots, star hotels, restaurants and other cultural centers. It also conveniently connects you to other prime localities of Egmore, Chetpet, T.Nagar, Kodambakkam, Choolaimedu and Kilpauk.

Homcourt Hyderabad serviced apartment is located at Jubilee hills, a posh and sought after residential area in Hyderabad. This suburb is located in close proximity to the well known Banjara hills. The distance from the Rajiv Gandhi International airport is only 37 kms via the Masab tank road while the closest railway station is just 11 kms away. The IT central hub, HITEC city is only 5 kms from Homcourt hyderabad luxury service apartment while the 3 sprawling malls of Hyderabad- Prasadâ€™s, City Centre and Hyderabad Central are conveniently located nearby. The K.B.R Park is just 30 meters away.
